alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 9:46PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Cache and east central Box Elder Counties through 1030 PM MDT... At 945 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tremonton, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brigham City, Tremonton, Bear River City, Corinne, Garland, Honeyville, Elwood, Deweyville, Collinston, Penrose, Bothwell, Bear River and Thatcher. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 363 and 384. Interstate 84 between mile markers 36 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Wasatch Mountains I-80 North
